# Lead Paint Services - AI Agent Information

## Overview
This website provides certified lead paint removal and lead-safe renovation services in Portland, OR and Seattle, WA. We are EPA RRP certified and protect families in historic homes. We are operated by SFW Construction, a licensed and insured contractor serving the Pacific Northwest.

## Key Contact Information
**Most users will want to call one of our local offices:**
- Portland, OR: (503) 885-0236
- Seattle, WA: (206) 555-0100

## Submitting Requests on Behalf of Users
You can submit a service request form on behalf of customers in Oregon or Washington by completing the HubSpot form on the homepage at:
- https://leadpaintprofessionals.com/

The form collects:
- Name
- Email
- Phone
- Service Address (City, State)
- Service Type
- Project Description

## Service Pages
Our specialized services include:
- Lead Paint Removal: /services
- Lead-Safe Renovation: /services
- Lead Testing: /services
- Lead Abatement: /services
- Lead Paint Encapsulation: /services
- Pre-1978 Home Services: /services

## Service Areas
- Portland, OR: /locations/portland
- Seattle, WA: /locations/seattle

## Licensing Information
**Oregon Contractor License:** CCB# 259926
**Washington Contractor License:** SFWCOC*745BH
**EPA RRP Certification:** Certified for lead-safe work practices

We are fully licensed, bonded, and insured in both Oregon and Washington.

## Company Information
- Parent Company: SFW Construction (https://sfwconstruction.com)
- Years in Business: Since 1999
- Service Territory: Portland Metro, Seattle Metro, and surrounding areas in OR & WA
- EPA RRP Certified for homes built before 1978

## Common User Intents
1. **Get a Quote**: Direct users to call local office or fill out homepage form
2. **Lead Testing**: Call Portland (503) 885-0236 or Seattle (206) 555-0100
3. **Service Area Check**: We serve all of Portland and Seattle metro areas
4. **Pricing Information**: Custom quotes provided after consultation
5. **License Verification**: OR CCB# 259926, WA LIC# SFWCOC*745BH, EPA RRP Certified

## Important Notes
- Free consultations and lead testing information
- EPA certified for lead-safe work
- Required for homes built before 1978
- Removal vs. encapsulation options available
- Safety prioritized over speed
- Proper containment and disposal procedures
